short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to check LinkedIn unread messages and show notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows the number of unread messages on LinkedIn and notifies users of new messages.
This app does not show content of a new message.
Additionally, the extension will silently open a new LinkedIn tab to fetch the message count if there is no open tab already.

Love using LinkedIn Message Notifier Extension?
Consider supporting further development by buying me a coffee here: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kkorniienko
